creditline: Gift of the W. Duncan and Nivin MacMillan Foundation
inscription:
Title and Inscription

URC, above image, in black ink: [Pl. 31]; URC, in image, in black ink: [MAP / Showing the present boundaries / of the / OJIBWA, MENOMONEE, WINNEBAGO, / and DAKOTAH TRIBES of INDIANS / 1851
provenance: James J. Hill (St. Paul, 1838-1916); his estate; James Jerome Hill Reference Library St. Paul (by 1921-1994; sold October, to MacMillan); W. Duncan MacMillan, Wayzata (1994-d. 2006); the W. Duncan and Nivin MacMillan Foundation (2006-2014; given to MIA)
signed: URC, in image under title, in black ink: [Drawn by Capt. S. Eastman U.S.A.]
title: Map Showing the Present Boundaries of the Ojibwa, Menomonee, Winnebago, and Dakotah Tribes of Indians 1851
